::::sendIgmpv3BadReport

proc  ::::sendIgmpv3BadReport { args }
################################################################# Procedure Name: sendIgmpv3BadReport Description: This proc is used to send Bad IGMPv3 Reports Note!! This used to be the original proc for sending v3 reports but the ip header link was wrong and this started causing problems. Input args: args Output args: None. Return value: Send IGMPv3 Messages Typical usage: sendIgmpv3BadReport -txPortId $host7 -hostIp $host7ip \ -srcIpAddr "$srcIp4" -groupAddr $grpAddr1 \ -reportType "15" -igmpMsgType "33" Category Types (Setup,GetSwitchInfo,SendTraffic,CaptureTraffic, VerifySwitchOutput,VerifyTraffic) Category: Traffic #################################################################
